''' Blood magic''' is a form of sorcery, forbidden among the [[Dothraki]]. [[Mirri Maz Duur]], a [[Lhazareen]] ''[[maegi]]'' and [[godswife]] of the [[Great Shepherd]] is a known practitioner.
